name: py-debtcollector
description:
A collection of Python deprecation patterns and strategies that help
you collect your technical debt in a non-destructive manner.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pbr
dependencies.description:
PBR is a library that injects some useful and sensible default behaviors
into your setuptools run.

dependencies.name: py-wrapt
dependencies.description: Module for decorators, wrappers and monkey patching.

dependent_to.name: py-oslo-utils
dependent_to.description:
The oslo.utils library provides support for common utility type
functions, such as encoding, exception handling, string manipulation,
and time handling.

dependent_to.name: py-python-keystoneclient
dependent_to.description:
This is a client for the OpenStack Identity API, implemented by the
Keystone team

dependent_to.name: py-oslo-config
dependent_to.description:
The Oslo configuration API supports parsing command line arguments and
.ini style configuration files.
